name: Jute Shoes
description: The espadrille (alpargatas) is a shoe from the Basque country (Spain), made of cotton or linen fabric with a flexible jute rope sole. This authentic Spanish shoe has been handcrafted for many generations in several small villages and has, therefore, a very long history associated with it. Entirely handmade, the espadrille symbolizes an ecological, easy going and dynamic lifestyle.
